name: Llama 3.1 70B Instruct
description: Meta's 70B parameter instruction-tuned language model for text generation and conversation

skills.name: Text Generation
skills.description: Generate contextually relevant text based on input prompts
examples: Write an essay about climate change
Create a marketing email for a new product
Generate a creative story about space exploration

skills.name: Code Generation
skills.description: Create code snippets and solutions for programming tasks
examples: Write a Python function to analyze text sentiment
Create a React component for a login form
Generate SQL queries for database operations

skills.name: Reasoning
skills.description: Solve problems requiring logical reasoning and analysis
examples: Analyze the economic impact of this policy change
Evaluate different approaches to this engineering challenge
